affx::TsvFileBinding Class Reference

TsvFileBinding records the binding of a Column to a field. When "tsv->bind()" is called, a TsvFileBinding is created to record /// The details of the binding. When a file is opened, the bindings are /// linked to the correct Columns. More...

#include <TsvFile.h>

Detailed Description

TsvFileBinding records the binding of a Column to a field. When "tsv->bind()" is called, a TsvFileBinding is created to record /// The details of the binding. When a file is opened, the bindings are /// linked to the correct Columns.
